zone.line: has himself nurtured desperate
thoughts, and longed with impatient
desire for death, but who has at
length trampled the phantom under
foot, and crushed his sting.. Come, as
you have played Despair with me
I will play the part of Una with you
and bring you hurtless from his dark
cavern. Listen to me, and let yourself
be softened by words in which no
selfish passion lingers.
"We know not whatt all this
wide world means; its strange mixture
of good and evil. But we have been
placed here and bid live and hope.
I know not what we are to hope;
but there is some good beyond us
that we must seek; and that is our
earthly task. If misfortune come against
us we must fight with her; we must
cast her aside, and still go on to find
